item.description:
Greetings All,

I need help (bodies, promotion, minimal monetary support – if able, bodies, donations, and any other help).

As some of you may know, next week is Ronald Reagn’s birthday. Imagine my surprise when I did not see any major event held in honor of the Gipper. As fate would have it, I was approached to help with Haiti relief. I thought it would be neat if he held a gather in honor of America’s greatest president, while helping with a cause.

All of you have the ability to get things done, with a sort turn around. I need your help now.

Feb 5, 6-8 PM, The Gipper’s birth anniversary /Haiti fundraiser.

I have secured the location (Great Bay Facility, Somersworth). The owner of this facility is a liberty minded, small business owner, and I would like to try an cover some of his cost (he has donated a bunch already). All the proceeds with go to fund two elements of Haiti relief:

· Help pay for a group of NH EMTs to travel down to Haiti and help

· Remainder to go to Catholic Relief Charities (they have feet on the ground, and lower cost overhead - always thinking like a conservative). Hi Jerry,

Starting from the bottom of my emails and working up. I see a few emails from the opera company. That is a wonderful idea. Thanks

The official invite will go out today. We will drive the RSVP to the event listing on my facebook, or people will be able to email me.

I am looking for a few other things: donations for door prizes (simply) and decorations (red white and blue balloons).

Is there anyone on your team that can join me to actively work through the details?

Thanks for being there.

Jeff Chidester the host on The Wave will is organizing this event. Please come enjoy and donate.
Semper Fi,
Jerry
item.name: Haiti Relief and President Reagan's Birthday
